item.title: Looper
item.description: Android MainLooper 监听的三个fd Mesasge fd InputChannel fd Vsync fd

item.title: Blog
item.description: This is first Blog how to build hugo blog hugo new site myblog // 创建本地文件 git clone https://github.com/digitalcraftsman/hugo-agency-theme //下载主题 hugo server -t hugo-agency-theme –buildDrafts //启动hugo hugo new post/blog.md //新建文章 hugo –theme=hugo-agency-theme –baseUrl=“https://xxx.github.io/" –buildDrafts 将个人博客部署到github仓库 将生成的publi文件夹推到远程仓库 访问地址 https://jianjiandong.github.io/
